Reviews.Title: thanks. perfect
Reviews.Author: Maegan
Reviews.Content: My phone came fast! I love the color and the price. There are only a few little scratches. The end.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone but a bit lazy
Reviews.Author: bwise
Reviews.Content: I really like this phone for a basic phone with querty keypad for texting, good audible quality. BUT it turns off randomly and that just gets annoying with everyday  use of a cell phone. I must say that the Brown Box company has been amazing with their customer service. Would highly recommend them.

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: Misty
Reviews.Content: got it pretty quick works like a charm good phone long battery would definitely by again thanks again for everything

Reviews.Title: Product was not working
Reviews.Author: robin bryant
Reviews.Content: When the phone arrived I got it activated it didn't work properly, the screen was dark. I returned it almost a month ago and never received another one in the mail as of yet. I will never recommend this phone to anybody

Reviews.Title: it is an ok phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I purchased the wrong phone. I wanted the env3 but i wasnt paying attention when I ordered...it doesnt have the features I was looking for but it will do in a pinch.

Reviews.Title: Good phone for the price
Reviews.Author: Trevor Strathie
Reviews.Content: Some of the bottons don't work and it doesn't vibrate when texts come through. It's hard to hear people when they call and it's not the service. Otherwise good phone for the amount of money

Reviews.Title: For an older phone it is great!
Reviews.Author: robin braswell
Reviews.Content: The phone came quickly .  Works great.  Battery life is good as long as you charge it every other day. For an older phone it works great and meets my needs.

Reviews.Title: Ratings
Reviews.Author: Summer Bruhn
Reviews.Content: The phone came a day or so earlier than promised.The phone was in good working condition- ready to be activated.Cosmetically the phone was in good condition as described.The price was very affordable.The Maroon phone I ordered, however did have a light blue faceplate (which was not the packaging film).That would have been my biggest and only complaint.Phone is currently being used, and no issues to speak of otherwise.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed!
Reviews.Author: marlyn
Reviews.Content: My cel hinge broke so I needed a phone fast! I found a similar cel and received it in 2 days! I wanted a similar phone so I could use the same batteries. Now I have 2 extra batteries from the old phone & 1 from this one, total of 3! Awesome!

Reviews.Title: Charging jack problems
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Mickey"
Reviews.Content: Bought this one to replace an old one I had for years that would no longer charge. This one lasted 3 months and then the charging jack fell out of it.  Not sure if I want to get a 3rd one or not, but I do like the phone a lot. It is small, simple, and has a qwerty keyboard - just the things I need - nothing fancy.....

Reviews.Title: verizon cell phone
Reviews.Author: Pat
Reviews.Content: phone fell apart in just a few weeks....front face fell off.  i did not to think to return it in time....wish i had.  pat k

Reviews.Title: Saved the Day!!
Reviews.Author: YaVonne Carter
Reviews.Content: I was on vacation and my VLG EnV2 in black fell off the bed and I couldn't see the screen when I opened it. So sucked!! My brother was in Afganistan and was texting me but with the large text's I couldn't see anything past one sentence with it closed..was so glad that I was able to get on-line at the hotel and buy the same phone but in red. Received it rather quickly and was able to keep in communication with my brother before it was black out again.

Reviews.Title: No Battery included.. Not happy :(
Reviews.Author: Wendy Smith
Reviews.Content: Didn't have a battery so I has to purchase one and substantial damage to outside, stickers indicated water damage. I don't know if it worked because I didn't have a battery..

Reviews.Title: This is not the phone you are looking for...
Reviews.Author: Derik G. Wilson "Derik"
Reviews.Content: This phone is great for texting and good for talking as long as you use a bluetooth headset.  The mic on the phone doesn't work well at all.  I had to reboot the phone before I called someone or they couldn't hear me.  The speakerphone was terrible.  I ended up ordering a new phone.  I will never buy another LG phone.

Reviews.Title: Phone
Reviews.Author: Delia Tash
Reviews.Content: The phone was a little scuffed up but functional and the seller was very conscientious about making sure it had a working battery.

Reviews.Title: Buying a phone because you hate smart phones
Reviews.Author: Chad
Reviews.Content: My phone broke and I refuse to turn over to iphones or smart phones. Whats wrong with a physical keyboard?? Nothing right?? Instead of ranting I will just say that for the most part I was satisfied. The charger was a complete joke as it is about 10 inches long and hung off the wall. I got what I paid for and I am happy. Although the battery is now complete garbage, figured I can just replace it. Its not bad, feel like I got an okay deal.

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: Matthew G Basgall
Reviews.Content: arrived on time. does what it says it would. good price... works for me. wish it had a bigger front screen.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Richard A. Reeves "Magic Touch"
Reviews.Content: The phone arrived fully charged.It is identical to the one being replaced which was an especially good phone.The keyboard is a special feature.Thanks,Richard

Reviews.Title: direct replacment for wifes phone
Reviews.Author: Lowell Bagley
Reviews.Content: would give 5 stars it's new and does what she wants but needed upgrade of software thats only reason for four star rating

Reviews.Title: Intermittent problems...
Reviews.Author: Trenton T Stokes
Reviews.Content: This is the 5th time I have gone online to replace this phone over a 7 year time period.  I love the phone and typically the phone doesn't get glichy until I have had the phone for about a year and a half.  This phone however, is refurbished (like the 3 before this one) and it turns off by itself on me, periodically, the front keypad won't respond or work at times.  I'm just hoping this one will last for another year, but at this rate, probably not.  I love everything about it though, the keyboard when it opens, it's nice compact size, takes decent pictures, etc.  Just not getting the performance from this one I usually do.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: lydia
Reviews.Content: these are awesome phones! they are durable and last a very very long time. I think my brother soaked his two or three times (once in motor oil) and it still work!

Reviews.Title: problem with phone!
Reviews.Author: eugene williams
Reviews.Content: had speaker problems with this phone from day one! occasionally, the phone rings, but missed many important calls.function key was also problematic; tried to contact amazon and originator about return/exchange. but got no reply; not at all pleased

Reviews.Title: new cell phone
Reviews.Author: Wes kahl
Reviews.Content: phone has querty keyboard which my wife wanted. Same phone as I have.Phone is good but has a tendency to go to "locked" too often making it onerous to use.

Reviews.Title: thanks
Reviews.Author: Victor Ponce
Reviews.Content: Phone was as described works and keeps track of mine activities with calendar option product is reliable and light weight

Reviews.Title: Decent no data plan phone...
Reviews.Author: LMK
Reviews.Content: I purchased this plan because I do not want a data plan and many of the other models require a data plan.  I did not want to increase my plan cost and this phone allows me to keep my current no data plan.  The key board is convenient, phone is sturdy and durable, strong signal, decent features.  A good buy and decent phone if you do not want a data plan.

Reviews.Title: Better than freebie phones
Reviews.Author: David W. Siu
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone as a replacement for the last enV2 which I had dropped on the floor and broken.  To put simply, it has been better in my experience to purchase a used phone that you know will hold quality than to pay $30 for your "free" phone from your provider of which you have no clue about its performance.When you know something works, stick to it.  Especially if it's cheaper than going another route.

Reviews.Title: Phne
Reviews.Author: Melinda A.
Reviews.Content: The phone is similar to the previous one I had and for the price u cannot go wrong very easy to use... Would certainly reccommend this product to customers

Reviews.Title: It's Just OK
Reviews.Author: martha beumer
Reviews.Content: If you think your going to get a clean almost new phone forget it. What I received was a phone with a lot of wear on the case and a missing cover for the smart chip. Now don't get me wrong it did work and it is still working and solved my problem as an inexpensive replacement for my old phone. So it served it's purpose but I would have liked something that didn't look like it was rode hard and put way wet.

Reviews.Title: broken screen
Reviews.Author: Forest
Reviews.Content: i was the phone was shipped with a broken screen, i was not pleased at all! ! ! ! !

Reviews.Title: Well, times are tough
Reviews.Author: Psychomaven
Reviews.Content: Which I suppose is why some merchants become creative about how to make money.  For instance, some merchants might sell you a phone, without a charger.  Then, when you return the phone because it doesn't work, they refund some, but not all of your money and then say that you never returned the charger.  Except for the fact that the phone's ring/vibrate function did not work, I liked the phone.  It also would have been nice if the phone had come with a wall charger, especially since I was charged for one.  Ultimately, I ended up doing business with Brownboxbonanza, who was not only HONEST, but pleasant to deal with as well.  So, the moral of the story is, if you like your money--and who doesn't--and you want to get your money's worth and be treated with respect, spend it elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Just what I was afraid of!
Reviews.Author: Ritchie Carbajal
Reviews.Content: 9 out of 10 calls get dropped, every other word cuts out, and now the battery won't charge.  The unit is refurbished but looks like new; was hoping it was completely tested but apparently not.  We're sending it back.

Reviews.Title: Problems
Reviews.Author: Veritas Vincit "Bill"
Reviews.Content: Had to return it after 1 week! Advertised as new, but charger and battery did not work.  Bought a different phone from Verizon.

Reviews.Title: Cheap painted balls
Reviews.Author: D. Jackson "dajenous"
Reviews.Content: I would have prefered the balls with the color embedded in them. I wish I had spent 30 bux more

Reviews.Title: a back up phone
Reviews.Author: Bama boy
Reviews.Content: it suits its purpose, good back up phone and easym to use would buy again recomend some one else buy this one

Reviews.Title: This was a rip-off in more ways than one!
Reviews.Author: Adrienne Baxter
Reviews.Content: My experience with this purchase was a complete disaster. First,  the Seller advertised it as a new phone. But when I received it, it already contained contacts, text messages and pictures. I contacted the Seller & he refunded part of my money since it was a USED phone. Then, when I took it to Verizon to activate it, the guy put me in a TWO-YEAR contract even though it was a NO CONTRACT phone. Next, I wanted to activate the EZ Navigator app while I was on an out-of-state trip. I was told I needed a software update which I could get at any Verizon Wireless store. I went to one store in Arizona and one store in Oklahoma, both of which told me they didn't do software updates on that phone anymore. Then, we discussed the possibility of upgrading to a new phone. That was when I found out the guy who activated the phone put me in a two-year contract with a no-contract phone. Then, I had to call Verizon and speak to various supervisors several times to convince them I wasn't even supposed to be in a contract so there shouldn't be an upgrade fee. Finally,  one person realized that I really was NOT supposed to be in a two-year contract so she changed the records. In spite of that, Verizon still wanted to charge me an upgrade fee. I finally told Verizon where to go and that I would NEVER do business with them again!

Reviews.Title: Horrible battery life
Reviews.Author: Joan
Reviews.Content: I love having to charge this phone every day. The battery is horrible!! What's the point of buying a phone that does not keep it's charge?? Very unhappy. The only positive to this purchase was that I got the phone very quickly.

No contract Verizon cell phone ready to activate on Verizon wireless
Excellent Conditioned Pre-Owned Phone, You Will Be Very Satisfied
Used no contract Verizon Cell Phone
Full 30 day customer satisfaction warranty
Please contact us with any questions and we will reply ASAP
ProductInfo.Name: Verizon LG enV2 VX9100 No Contract 3G Camera QWERTY MP3 Cell Phone Maroon
